resources.string: The application requires Android %1$s. But your device is only running Android %2$s. Either choose a different app, update your operating system or switch to a newer smartphone.

Firefox Preview (also known as Fenix) is an all-new browser for Android. This app is currently under development and contains more trackers than usual to analyse/improve the app usage.\n\nThe app will be downloaded from GitHub - only updates which are released on GitHub can be downloaded.
This app is designed for testers and therefore it contains some trackers. Do you really want to install this app?
This is the default and well-known Firefox browser from Mozilla.\n\nThe app will be downloaded from the official Mozilla API.
Failed to fetch the download url from %1$s
This is a modification of the Firefox browser aimed to increase privacy.\n\nThe app will be downloaded from GitHub - only updates which are released on GitHub can be downloaded.

This is a modification of the Firefox browser aimed to increase privacy.

Firefox Klar is developed for Germany, Switzerland and Austria and is almost identical to Firefox Focus. Only the name was changed to avoid confusion with the news magazine 'Focus' from the 'Hubert Burda Media' media group.

The app will be downloaded from GitHub - only updates which are released on GitHub can be downloaded.

Firefox Lite is primary developed for users in Indonesia. The app is very small and supports techniques to reduce (mobile) data consumption.\n\nThe app will be downloaded from GitHub - only updates which are released on GitHub can be downloaded.

This is an updater for multiple browsers from Mozilla. Click the plus-button for installation and the down-arrow-button for updating. You can check for new updates by down-swiping or reopening the app. By default the app will check regularly for updates in the background. I did my best to secure the installation/updating process - feel free to double-check it or improve it by creating a pull-request.

Either an attacker has replaced the correct download with a tampered one or the certificate checker doesn\'t work anymore. You can double-check the certificate fingerprint on apkmirror.com or you can create an issue on https://notabug.org/Tobiwan/ffupdater to inform my about the bug.

Either a tampered application has been installed or the certificate checker doesn\'t work anymore. You can double-check the certificate fingerprint on apkmirror.com or you can create an issue on https://notabug.org/Tobiwan/ffupdater to inform my about the bug.\n\nI recommend you to uninstall the application.
How often should the app check for updates?
These applications are not automatically checked for updates
The selected browser is incompatible with your smartphone\'s processor. Please select a different browser.
This notification category will inform you about new available Firefox updates.
You can now close this window
